{"id":488691375,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1620121700,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/488691375/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Non-decreasing Array","memory":"27.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkPossibility(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<int> nums2(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        return fixLows(nums) || fixHighs(nums2);\n    }\n    bool fixLows(vector<int> &nums) {\n        bool fixed = false;\n        for (int i = 1; i < nums.size(); i++) {\n            if (nums[i] < nums[i-1]) {\n                if (fixed) return false;\n                fixed = true;\n                nums[i] = nums[i - 1];\n            }\n        } \n        return true;\n    }\n    bool fixHighs(vector<int> &nums) {\n        bool fixed = false;\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size() - 1; i++) {\n            if (nums[i] > nums[i+1]) {\n                if (fixed) return false;\n                fixed = true;\n                nums[i] = nums[i + 1];\n                if (i > 0 && nums[i-1] > nums[i]) return false;\n            }\n        } \n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"non-decreasing-array"}
